User API

Method URL Description
GET / Brings you to the API Usage Page that you are currently on.
GET /Users Returns a list of all of the current users.
POST /User Posts a new User with the following properties. UserID, FirstName, LastName, EmailAddress, Password
GET /User/{ID} Returns a specified user if it exists.
PATCH /User/{ID} Allows you to update a users properties if they exist. (Not including their UserID).
DELETE /User/{ID} Allows you to delete a user if they exist.
